column4: now I went to /etc/modules to add a snd_pcm at the end, I thought that was it, but no result. Module is intel8x0, it seems to be installed this time. I was told yeasterday that the kernel was supposed to handle it out of the box, yet nada. Obviously, I've checked the trivia (not mute? right file format?) before doing anything
did you try with buggy driver ?
wait i ll give you my config
should I check the same files to see if that's it?
no they are not the same , backup your config and paste that .
I paste it at the end, WITH all the rest or as replacement of the rest?
that did not solve the prob :(
ok if you dont hear sound cancel it ctrl+c . Are you shure its not muted ? run alsamixer and see that there are no (m) muted channels that you need
ok, I see the bastard, what do I do with it?
